ModMetaData.name: Variety Matters Stockpile
ModMetaData.author: Cozarkian
ModMetaData.description: Adds several new features to stockpile filters for added control over what to store, how much to store, and when to fill a stockpile. Features include the ability to limit duplicate stacks of the same item, store smaller stacks, and prevent stockpiles from refilling until a specified number of cells are empty.
